twine.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: strong string made by twisting together two or more threads or strings
twine.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a bundle of papers tied up with twine
twine.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to wind or twist around something else, or to make something do this
twine.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: She twined her arms round him and kissed his cheek.
A dark green ivy plant twined around the pole.
